about_the_game:
DEMO WILL BE AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER 2024!

Robin in da Hood is a light and humorous take on the famous legend of Robin Hood. It is a 3D, top-down single player action-adventure game set in medieval England, inspired by Grand Theft Auto 2 and ‘Men in Tights’. The game approaches its subject matter from a light-hearted perspective, presenting the adventures of the famous British outlaw with a tongue-in-cheek twist and bucketloads of crazy humor. Historical accuracy and political correctness go straight out the window, being replaced with biting satire, pythonesque antics and slapstick comedy.



Robin in da Hood delivers over-the-top action, thrilling adventures and hilarious parody in an evergreen setting, all clad in a tried and tested gameplay format.

The key game pillars are:
Humor
From sarcastic dialogue, through distorted re-imagining of the classic characters, and all the way to various forms of skullduggery that the player can engage in, Robin in da Hood is as irreverent take on the famous legend as it can get. The game has no mercy in its treatment of the source material and goes to any lengths to scorn, deride, and jeer at the evergreen tale.



Freedom
Apart from main story missions, the game world allows for a wide variety of and additional activities that the player will be able to engage in. Fighting the guards, stealing horses, and all sorts of other interactions with the folk of Nottinghamshire will be possible, allowing the player to either act noble and stand against the oppressors of the poor, or to wreak havoc in the medieval hood and become the number one troublemaker in town.



Accessibility
Thanks to its accessible interface and familiar playstyle, Robin in da Hood can be enjoyed by anyone. The simple and streamlined tutorial will have new players jump into the adventure in no time, without the need to understand complex or challenging systems.

name: Robin In Da Hood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Robin in da Hood is a light and humorous take on the famous legend of Robin Hood. It is a 3D, top-down single player action-adventure game set in medieval England.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
